title: Fwrbuni mungwi sofwinai subung
lyrics:
Fwrbuni mungwi sofwinai subung
Jiuni nangoukhou hastainai subung – 2
Jwng hambai hwnw rwja-rwja
Phwrbuni mungwi borai layw - 2
(A)
Gaswi nangou fwrkhou, jrab garnanwi
Gaswi hengta fwrkhou baogarnanwi – 2
Sofwi habai dinwi be langwnao - 2
(B)
Jiuni gangnai arw unkwinaikhou
Phwrbu Jisuniao swfungjanw – 2
Sofwi habai dinwi be langwnao - 2
